metadata.title: CVE-2024-8266 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 17.1 prior to 17.6.0, which allows an attacker with maintainer role totrigger a pipeline as project owner under certain circumstances.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
